description: <p>An exciting opportunity has arisen for a Practitioner tojoin a highlymotivated specialist team. Whilst this team requires a specialist practitioner if we are not able to appoint a qualified practitioner we will consider a training opportunity as outlined within the job description. This role covers a variety of specialisms across head and neck services including Maxillofacial and Ear, Nose and Throat. This position will work alongside the Multi-Disciplinary Team and offer senior leadership to the nursing team.</p>
title: Head & Neck Practitioner
